Name: GrandChase
About the game: Grand Chase is a side-scrolling online action RPG with anime inspired graphics. Anyone can join in on the action with arrow and Z keys with unique and charming characters. There are various dungeons in a fantasy setting and online real-time PvP. Collect equipment and learn skills to enjoy jampacked action in dungeons and PvP. Main Content 20 Unique Characters Expand the available skills through changing jobs and create your unique skill tree to differentiate your character from others. Dungeon Mode Party up with your friends to explore the vast lands. (Solo play also available) : Normal Dungeon – Follow the stories of the characters and the world of Grand Chase. : Heroic Dungeon – Clear each dungeon to obtain the best available equipment. : Event Dungeon – Enjoy a different kind of fun from other dungeons. PvP Mode With your unique skill tree, play strategic matches against other players in various PvP modes. Play together between 2~6 players. You can play Item Match, Team Match, and Singles Match in Normal and Deathmatch modes. Customization There are various weapons, armor set, and accessories that allow you to customize your characters to stand out in a crowd.
Meta Title: GrandChase: Jul 27, 2021, KOG and Full Overview
